name: CustomISA
description: Example ISA with custom instruction implementations

instructions.implementation:
# Load immediate instruction
imm_val = operands['imm']
truncated_val = imm_val & 0xFFFF
write_register(operands['rd'], truncated_val)
# Set flags
set_flag('Z', truncated_val == 0)
set_flag('N', (truncated_val & 0x8000) != 0)

# Custom implementation for ADD instruction
rd_val = read_register(operands['rd'])
rs2_val = read_register(operands['rs2'])
result = (rd_val + rs2_val) & 0xFFFF
write_register(operands['rd'], result)
# Set flags
set_flag('Z', result == 0)
set_flag('N', (result & 0x8000) != 0)
set_flag('C', (rd_val + rs2_val) > 0xFFFF)

# Custom multiplication instruction
rd_val = read_register(operands['rd'])
rs2_val = read_register(operands['rs2'])
result = (rd_val * rs2_val) & 0xFFFF
write_register(operands['rd'], result)
# Set flags
set_flag('Z', result == 0)
set_flag('N', (result & 0x8000) != 0)

instructions.semantics: temp = rd; rd = rs2; rs2 = temp
instructions.implementation:
# Custom swap instruction
rd_val = read_register(operands['rd'])
rs2_val = read_register(operands['rs2'])
write_register(operands['rd'], rs2_val)
write_register(operands['rs2'], rd_val)

instructions.semantics: Copy 16 bytes from address in rs2 to address in rd
instructions.implementation:
# Custom memory copy instruction
src_addr = read_register(operands['rs2'])
dst_addr = read_register(operands['rd'])
for i in range(16):
    if src_addr + i < len(memory) and dst_addr + i < len(memory):
        value = memory[src_addr + i]
        memory[dst_addr + i] = value

directives.name: .magic
directives.description: Custom directive that creates magic data
directives.implementation:
# Custom magic directive implementation
# Creates a special pattern based on the input value
value = int(args[0]) if args else 0
magic_pattern = value ^ 0xDEADBEEF
# Create 4 bytes of magic data
result = []
for i in range(4):
    result.append((magic_pattern >> (i * 8)) & 0xFF)
result = bytes(result)
# Update current address
context.current_address += len(result)
assembler.context.current_address = context.current_address
assembler.symbol_table.set_current_address(context.current_address)

directives.name: .repeat
directives.description: Custom directive that repeats a value multiple times
directives.implementation:
# Custom repeat directive implementation
# Repeats a value a specified number of times
if len(args) >= 2:
    # Handle hex values
    value_str = args[0]
    if value_str.startswith('0x'):
        value = int(value_str, 16) & 0xFF
    else:
        value = int(value_str) & 0xFF
    count = int(args[1])
    result = bytes([value] * count)
    # Update current address
    context.current_address += len(result)
    assembler.context.current_address = context.current_address
    assembler.symbol_table.set_current_address(context.current_address)
else:
    result = bytes()
